remarks: Version of ~ cbv3h with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbv3hv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
bj-cbv3hv.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
bj-cbv3hv.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbv3hv $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
